Property.Name: DerAmoutAppliedExp
Property.Expression: DerAppliedAmt + DerExpenses

Property.Name: DerAppliedAmt
Property.Expression: isnull((select sum(ar.zpv_amount) from zla_ar_hdr_mst ar where ar.zpv_clearing = Clearing),0)

Property.Name: DerExpenses
Property.Expression: isnull((select sum(amount) * -1 from zpv_ar_clearing_expenses cle where cle.clearing = Clearing),0)

Property.Name: DerBankType
Property.Expression: (select top(1) c.zla_bank_type from zpv_ar_payments a join posm_pay_type_mst b on b.posm_pay_type = a.pay_type join bank_hdr_mst c on c.bank_code = b.bank_code where a.pay_type = PayType)

Property.Name: DerBankType
Property.Expression: (select top(1) c.zla_bank_type from zpv_co_payments a join posm_pay_type_mst b on b.posm_pay_type = a.pay_type join bank_hdr_mst c on c.bank_code = b.bank_code where a.pay_type = pay_type)

Property.Name: GLBankBankCodeDescription
Property.Expression: isnull((select name from bank_hdr_mst where bank_code = GLBankBankCode),'')

Property.Name: GLBankZlaThirdBankCodeDesc
Property.Expression: isnull((select [description] from zla_bank_mst where bank_id = GLBankZlaThirdBankId),'')

Property.Name: DerNetUnitPrice
Property.Expression: isnull(ContPriceConv - isnull(ZpvTotalDisc,0),0)

Property.Name: DerPromotionDescription
Property.Expression: isnull((select description from price_promotion where promotion_code = ZpvPromotionCode),'')

Property.Name: DerQtyNotReleased
Property.Expression: BlanketQtyConv - DerQtyReleased

Property.Name: DerQtyReleased
Property.Expression: isnull((SELECT sum(coitem.qty_ordered_conv) FROM coitem WHERE coitem.co_num = CoNum and coitem.co_line = CoLine),0)

Property.Name: DerReservedTemp
Property.Expression: isnull((select count(res.co_num) from zpv_cobln_res res where res.co_num = CoNum and res.co_line = CoLine),0)

Property.Name: DerTotalPrice
Property.Expression: DerNetUnitPrice * BlanketQtyConv

Property.Name: DerZpvCoStatInternal
Property.Expression: (SELECT zpv_stat_internal FROM co WHERE co_num = CoNum)

Property.Name: DerCoBlnLines
Property.Expression: isnull((select COUNT(1) from co_bln where co_num = CoNum),0)

Property.Name: DerGenericCustType
Property.Expression: (select isnull(generic_cust_type,'') from zpv_parms where parms_key = 0)

Property.Name: DerOnAccountType
Property.Expression: (select on_account_type from zpv_parms where parms_key = 0)

Property.Name: DerTaxDocType
Property.Expression: (select top(1) att.char_attribute6 from customer_mst cus left join attribute_value_mst att on att.RefRowPointer = cus.RowPointer where cus.cust_num = CustNum)

Property.Name: DerTotalFreight
Property.Expression: Freight + Freight * (ZpvTaxPercTotal /100)

Property.Name: DerTotalInvoicedAmt
Property.Expression: ISNULL( (SELECT TOP (1) (amount + sales_tax + sales_tax_2 + freight + misc_charges) FROM artran WHERE artran.co_num = CoNum and artran.inv_num = ZpvInvNum and artran.type = 'I' ORDER BY artran.inv_seq) , 0)

Property.Name: DerTotalMisc
Property.Expression: MiscCharges + MiscCharges * (ZpvTaxPercTotal /100)

Property.Name: DerTotalPayments
Property.Expression: ISNULL( (SELECT SUM(zpv_co_payments.amount) FROM zpv_co_payments WHERE zpv_co_payments.co_num = CoNum) , 0)

Property.Name: DerTotalReleased
Property.Expression: (select top(1) round((select sum(coi.qty_ordered_conv) from coitem_mst coi where coi.co_num = cob.co_num and coi.co_line = cob.co_line) * cob.zpv_unit_price,2) from co_bln_mst cob where cob.co_num = CoNum)

Property.Name: DerZpvOldStat
Property.Expression: ZpvStat

Property.Name: DerZpvTranportType
Property.Expression: (SELECT TOP(1) transport FROM shipcode_mst WHERE ship_code = ShipCode)

Property.Name: ZpvTaxPercTotal
Property.Expression: dbo.ZPV_CoTotalTax(CoNum)

Property.Name: ZpvTaxPercTotalFreight
Property.Expression: dbo.ZPV_CoTotalTaxFreight(CoNum)

Property.Name: ZpvTaxPercTotalMisc
Property.Expression: dbo.ZPV_CoTotalTaxMisc(CoNum)

Property.Name: ZpvTotalCOAmt
Property.Expression: isnull(Price,0)+isnull(SalesTax2,0)+isnull(SalesTax,0)+isnull(Freight,0)

Property.Name: DerCustType
Property.Expression: (SELECT cus.cust_type FROM customer cus WHERE cust_num = CustNum AND cust_seq = CustSeq)

Property.Name: DerTotalInvoices
Property.Expression: (select sum(dom_amt_applied) from zpv_tt_arpmtd where cust_num = CustNum)

Property.Name: DerQtyNetAvail
Property.Expression: isnull(QtyOnHand,0) - isnull(QtyRsvdCo,0)

Property.Name: DerQtyAvailable
Property.Expression: isnull((QtyOnHand - QtyRsvd - DerQtyReserverdTemp),0)

Property.Name: DerQtyReserverdTemp
Property.Expression: (select isnull(sum(res.qty_reserved),0) from zpv_cobln_res res where res.whse = Whse and res.lot = Lot and res.item = Item)
